description: Also called 「Wan aimei」. Intentionally keeping a relationship ambiguous (more than friends, less than lovers).

examples.translation: Either break up or be together, don't play games (keep it ambiguous).

examples.chinese: 不许和别的男人搞暧昧
examples.translation: You are not allowed to flirt with other men.

examples.chinese: 不要与异性勾三搭四,不要和陌生男人玩暧昧
examples.translation: Don't fool around with the opposite sex, don't play ambiguous games with strange men.

examples.chinese: 他的私生活混乱与多位粉丝搞暧昧
examples.translation: His private life is messy, he flirts with many fans.
